channel.title: IOS - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in IOS on Today I Learnt...

item.title: That macOS Ventura and iOS 15 can play background rain noise
item.description: For years, I’ve been using https://rain.today for background rain noise, but I recently discovered that macOS Ventura and iOS 15 can play rain noise too.

item.title: How to effectively scan files using an iPhone
item.description: In iOS 13 the Files app has a useful utility for scanning files accessed via the ellipsis menu in the top-right of the screen.
